an5.125:1.3: Asappayakari hoti, sappaye mattam na janati, aparinatabhoji ca hoti, akalacari ca hoti, abrahmacari ca.
an5.125:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma anayussa.
an5.125:2.3: Sappayakari hoti, sappaye mattam janati, parinatabhoji ca hoti, kalacari ca hoti, brahmacari ca.
an5.125:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma ayussa”ti.
